result.title: "Report on organization of hands-on workshop - ""Application of flow cytometry methods in Immuno-Oncology"""
result.description: Report on organized workshop will include an agenda, a list of participants, presentations and conclusions. Each of the reports will be complemented by an evaluation on whether the concerned activities contribute to the Research Potential increase of the applicants and the necessary measures to be taken in order to preserve the sustainability of the implemented actions or benefits. Report will also include the summary of STREAM financial resources exploitation.

result.title: Transport projects & future technologies synopses handbook
result.description: A handbook that provides an overview of concepts and developments in the transport sector by summarizing and explaining for each sub-sector and category of development the most relevant sources in an integrated and comprehensive way. The handbook will include a one-page summary (standardized for all projects) of key elements (i.e. transport sector; researched technology, policy; challenges addressed; objectives; research priorities identified; a representative photo) of each report/project. It will be in the form of a project dictionary, giving a snapshot of each project, with pages colour coded by transport sector and further classified in categories, such as economic efficiency; competitiveness, sustainability, user convenience, inclusiveness.

project.title: INtentify future Transport rEsearch NeeDs
